markdownRemark.html: Private and independent center, dedicated primarily to teaching Spanish as a foreign language, but cater for courses, along with the numerous cultural activities and various accommodation options. They have Spanish programs for all ages and interests.

frontmatter.title: Escuela de Idiomas Nerja
frontmatter.description: Escuela de Idiomas Nerja - Private and independent center, dedicated primarily to teaching Spanish as a foreign language, but cater for courses, along with the numerous cultural activities and various accommodation options. They have Spanish programs for all ages and interests.
